name: Deltazone
description:
Join our DISCORD Server for more updates.
https://discord.gg/u2yRhhr

DELTAZONE drops players into an unprecedented global conflict that has been going on for a few years. Your mission is to wipe out the opposing team and take back the land that was once yours.

Your fate depends on your skill

Base game includes:

- DeathMatch
- Team DeathMatch
- Domination
- Bomb

More GameModes will be added Either as DLC or base content. This will be decided in a later date.

You will be able to join players that host DLC Maps/GameModes, You just cant host matches with those specific Maps/GameModes.

ASSAULT CLASS


LMG CLASS


SMG CLASS


SHOTGUN CLASS


SNIPER CLASS
